description: This plugin checks if a channel is the specified type
name: channelType
author: @Benzo-Fury [<@762918086349029386>]

description: This is perm check, it allows users to parse the permission you want and let the plugin do the rest. (check bot or user for that perm).
name: requirePermission
author: @Benzo-Fury [<@762918086349029386>]
@needhamgary [<@342314924804014081>]

description: [DEPRECATED] It allows you to publish your application commands using the discord.js library with ease.
name: publish
author: @EvolutionX-10 [<@697795666373640213>]

description: Disables a command entirely, for whatever reasons you may need.
name: disable
author: @jacoobes [<@182326315813306368>]
@Peter-MJ-Parker [<@371759410009341952>]

description: This is OwnerOnly plugin, it allows only bot owners to run the command, like eval.
name: ownerOnly
author: @EvolutionX-10 [<@697795666373640213>]

description: Inspired by the plugin "requirePermission" created by Benzo-Fury & needhamgary, this plugin will set permissions for specific subcommands without manually writing it into the code.
name: subcommandPermCheck
author: @Peter-MJ-Parker [<@371759410009341952>]
@MaxiIsSlayy [<@237210568791031809>]

description: This is dmOnly plugin, it allows commands to be run only in DMs.
name: dmOnly
author: @EvolutionX-10 [<@697795666373640213>]

description:
This is buttonConfirmation plugin, it runs confirmation prompt in the form of buttons.
 Note that you need to use edit/editReply in the command itself because we are already replying in the plugin!
 Credits to original plugin of confirmation using reactions and its author!
name: buttonConfirmation
author: @EvolutionX-10 [<@697795666373640213>]

description: Asks the user for a confirmation msg before executing the command
name: confirmation
author: @trueharuu [<@504698587221852172>]

description: This plugin checks if the channel is nsfw and responds to user with a specified response if not nsfw
name: nsfwOnly
author: @Benzo-Fury [<@762918086349029386>]
@SrIzan10 [<@703974042700611634>]

description:
Generalized `filter` plugin. all credit to trueharuu.
 Perform declarative conditionals as plugins.
name: filter
author: @trueharuu [<@504698587221852172>]

description:
This plugin checks the fields of a ModalSubmitInteraction
 with regex or a custom callback
name: assertFields
author: @jacoobes [<@182326315813306368>]

description:
This is perm check, it allows users to parse the permission you want and let the plugin do the rest. (check user for that perm).
 Each function (other than "command") allows multiple options! [ { ... }, { ... }, { ... } ] See examples!
name: permCheck
author: @Benzo-Fury [<@762918086349029386>]
@Peter-MJ-Parker [<@371759410009341952>]
@MaxiIsSlayy [<@237210568791031809>]

description:
fromCallback turns a callback into a plugin result.
 if the callback returns truthy value, plugin continues.
 This control plugin works for every command type. The arguments of the callback
 mirror the execute method on the current module.
name: fromCallback
author: @jacoobes [<@182326315813306368>]

description: Checks if a command is available in a specific server.
name: serverOnly
author: @Peter-MJ-Parker [<@371759410009341952>]

description: Allows you to set cooldowns (or "ratelimits") for commands, limits user/channel/guild actions.
name: cooldown
author: @trueharuu [<@504698587221852172>]
